org.jetel.component

Interface MetadataProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentMetadataProvider, MultiMetadataProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMultiMetadataProvider, AproxMergeJoin, DataIntersection, LookupJoin, PortToPortMetadataProvider, Reformat, StaticMetadataProvider

    public interface MetadataProvider
    Components can provide default metadata for theirs input and output ports. These metadata are automatically propagated to connected edges if the edge does not have defined metadata. Propagation resolver is available to recursive metadata searching. For example if you want to say, that metadata on requested port are identical with the metadata on an other port - use MetadataPropagationResolver to find the metadata.
